item.title: Creative cycle
item.description: Admidst my finals, I wanted to take a break and share an excerpt from one of my papers. I don’t know whether it’s the lack of sleep, or overdose of caffeine, but I’m particularly proud of this closing paragraph: Ask any creative - writer, designer or artist - and they will tell you that their work is never done. Even in our downtime, our minds are constantly growing organic ideas planted in the soil of our experiences.
